typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{canal distru} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		Marque as string,
		NomATC as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		no_offre as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		distributeur as string,
		Matricule as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		sous_famille as string,
		article as string,
		marque as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		id_canal as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		right_marque as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		canal as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BCUnion
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ArticleHierarchi
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Plateformes
source(output(
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtractionCompte
source(output(
		Client as string,
		BrandID as string,
		{Code Postal} as string,
		Nom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ClientEHS
source(output(
		{plateforme/vente directe} as string,
		{affecte/non_affecte} as string,
		{origine de la ligne} as string,
		{code produit} as string,
		{code client plateforme livree} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		quantite as string,
		ca as string,
		canal_distribution_final as string,
		{nom du canal} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{Code client livré} as string,
		marque as string,
		{id marque} as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.local.designation} as string,
		{N2.local.designation} as string,
		{N3.local.designation} as string,
		{N4.local.designation} as string,
		{N6.local.designation} as string,
		{N7.local.designation} as string,
		{code postal livrer} as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		{ATC livré} as string,
		{ATC offre} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		{N5.local.designation} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> InputManuel
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc = qte_ecoulement,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		document_vente = {Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.} = {Recept de march},
		Right_reference = reference,
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		Right_HubSAPid = HubSAPid,
		Type_Facturation = {Type de facture},
		qt_fact = {Qté facturée},
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		Commande = {Motif commande},
		no_offre,
		{ATC 2} = {ATC Performance},
		canal,
		{ATC 1} = ATC,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		date_id,
		HubName,
		id_canal_final,
		{qte plateforme final} = qte_ecoulement,
		{ca plateforme final} = ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qt_factur_e = qt_final,
		Sum_ca_factur_ = ca_final,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement = ca_final,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement = qt_final,
		id_canal,
		marque_code,
		{Document de vente},
		{Type de facture},
		Client,
		Marque = BCUnion@Marque,
		{Motif commande},
		{ commerciale} = marque_code,
		marque_id = marque_code,
		Offre,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		qt_ecc_enrichi,
		{qte plateforme final},
		{ca plateforme final}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive({ATC 2} = iif(isNull({ATC 2}),'',{ATC 2}),
		{ATC 1} = iif(isNull({ATC 1}),'',{ATC 1})) ~> Cleansing
Cleansing derive(ATC = iif(distributeur!='vente directe', 
 iif({ATC 2}!='', {ATC 2}, {ATC 1}),
  iif({ATC Corrigé}!='', {ATC Corrigé}, iif({ATC 2}!='', {ATC 2}, {ATC 1}))),
		source_atc = iif(isNull({ATC 2})||{ATC 2}!='0','[ATC 2]','[ATC 1]')) ~> AtcSOurceATC
AtcSOurceATC derive(marque_id = iif(instr(marque_name, 'SaunierDuval')>0,
 1604, 
 iif(instr(marque_name, 'Vaillant')>0, 1621, 1621))) ~> MarqueID
ArticleHierarchi select(mapColumn(
		OrgCm,
		CDis,
		reference = Article,
		Description,
		{Hiérarch.groupe},
		{Hiérarch.locale},
		Predecessor,
		Successor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Déb. val.},
		N1groupe = {N1.groupe},
		N2groupe = {N2.groupe},
		N3groupe = {N3.groupe},
		N4groupe = {N4.groupe},
		N5groupe = {N5.groupe},
		N6groupe = {N6.groupe},
		N7groupe = {N7.groupe},
		N1locale = {N1.locale},
		N2locale = {N2.locale},
		N3locale = {N3.locale},
		N4locale = {N4.locale},
		N5locale = {N5.locale},
		N6locale = {N6.locale},
		N7locale = {N7.locale},
		N1groupedesignation = {N1.groupe.designation},
		N2groupedesignation = {N2.groupe.designation},
		N3groupedesignation = {N3.groupe.designation},
		N4groupedesignation = {N4.groupe.designation},
		N5groupedesignation = {N5.groupe.designation},
		N6groupedesignation = {N6.groupe.designation},
		N7groupedesignation = {N7.groupe.designation},
		N1localedesignation = {N1.locale.designation},
		N2localedesignation = {N2.locale.designation},
		N3localedesignation = {N3.locale.designation},
		N4localedesignation = {N4.locale.designation},
		N5localedesignation = {N5.locale.designation},
		N6localedesignation = {N6.locale.designation},
		N7localedesignation = {N7.locale.designation}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameReference
renameReference aggregate(groupBy(reference),
	Successor = max(Successor),
		CDis = max(CDis),
		OrgCm = max(OrgCm),
		Predecessor = max(Predecessor),
		St = max(St),
		{Désignation Statut} = max({Désignation Statut}),
		{Deb val} = max({Déb. val.}),
		N1groupe = max(N1groupe),
		N2groupe = max(N2groupe),
		N3groupe = max(N3groupe),
		N4groupe = max(N4groupe),
		N5groupe = max(N5groupe),
		N6groupe = max(N6groupe),
		N7groupe = max(N7groupe),
		N1groupedesignation = max(N1groupedesignation),
		N2groupedesignation = max(N2groupedesignation),
		N3groupedesignation = max(N3groupedesignation),
		N4groupedesignation = max(N4groupedesignation),
		N5groupedesignation = max(N5groupedesignation),
		N6groupedesignation = max(N6groupedesignation),
		N7groupedesignation = max(N7groupedesignation),
		N1localedesignation = max(N1localedesignation),
		N2localedesignation = max(N2localedesignation),
		N3localedesignation = max(N3localedesignation),
		N4localedesignation = max(N4localedesignation),
		N5localedesignation = max(N5localedesignation),
		N6localedesignation = max(N6localedesignation),
		N7localedesignation = max(N7localedesignation),
		N1locale = max(N1locale),
		N2locale = max(N2locale),
		N3locale = max(N3locale),
		N4locale = max(N4locale),
		N5locale = max(N5locale),
		N6locale = max(N6locale),
		N7locale = max(N7locale),
		{Hiérarchgroupe} = max({Hiérarch.groupe}),
		{Hiérarchlocale} = max({Hiérarch.locale})) ~> UniqueReferenc
MarqueID, UniqueReferenc join(Select1@reference == UniqueReferenc@reference,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinArticle
MarqueID, UniqueReferenc join(Select1@reference == UniqueReferenc@reference,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinArticle
toDoubleCA derive(qt_final = iif(isNull(qt_ecc_enrichi),
 {qte plateforme final},
  iif(isNull({qte plateforme final}),qt_ecc_enrichi,qt_ecc_enrichi)),
		ca_final = coalesce(  ca_ecc_enrichi , {ca plateforme final} ),
		canal_distribution_final = iif(isNull({Canal distribution}), 
 iif(isNull(id_canal_final),
 id_canal,id_canal_final),
 {Canal distribution}
 )) ~> QtFinalCaFinalCanalDistributin
RenameCaFinal derive(ca_ecc_enrichi = toDouble(ca_ecc_enrichi),
		{ca plateforme final} = toDouble(ca_ecc_enrichi)) ~> toDoubleCA
QtFinalCaFinalCanalDistributin derive(year = substring(yearmonth,1,4),
		month = substring(yearmonth,5,2)) ~> ExtractYearandMonth
Plateformes derive(Distributeur = lower(WholeSalerID),
		Dist = lower(WholeSalerID)) ~> Distributeur
Distributeur derive(Distributeur = iif(Distributeur=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',
  iif(instr(Distributeur, 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva', 
   iif(instr(Distributeur, 'dsc')>0, 'dsc', 
    iif(instr(Distributeur, 'vf' )>0, 'vf', 
     iif(instr(Distributeur, 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',
Dist)))))) ~> distributeurr
distributeurr select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid,
		t_distrubuteur = Distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameDistributeur
ExtractYearandMonth, RenameDistributeur join(RenameCaFinal@HubSAPid == RenameDistributeur@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPlateforme
JoinPlateforme derive(distributeur = iif(isNull(RenameCaFinal@HubSAPid), distributeur, 'plateforme'+distributeur)) ~> CDistributeur
CDistributeur derive(POSSAMidString = iif(POSSAMidString=='', RenameCaFinal@HubSAPid, POSSAMidString)) ~> PossmidString
Select2, SelectNomClient union(byName: true)~> UnionClientEHSandExtractionCompte
UnionClientEHSandExtractionCompte aggregate(groupBy({Numéro du compte}),
	{Nom du compte} = max({Nom du compte}),
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} = max({Groupe cible/Typologie générale}),
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} = max({Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée}),
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} = max({Compte principal: Numéro du compte}),
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} = max({Compte principal: Nom du compte})) ~> AgregatNumeroCompte
ClientEHS select(mapColumn(
		{Numéro du compte} = Client,
		{Nom du compte} = Nom
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNomClient
PossmidString, AgregatNumeroCompte join(POSSAMidString == {Numéro du compte},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCompte
JoinCompte select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = RenameCaFinal@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc = qte_ecoulement,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		document_vente,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		Right_reference = reference,
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		Right_HubSAPid = RenameCaFinal@HubSAPid,
		Type_Facturation,
		qt_ecc_enrichi = {Qté facturée},
		ca_ecc_enrichi,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		Commande,
		no_offre,
		{ATC 2},
		canal,
		{ATC 1},
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		date_id,
		HubName = RenameCaFinal@HubName,
		id_canal_final,
		{qte plateforme final},
		id_canal,
		marque_code,
		Client,
		Marque,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		Offre,
		ATC,
		source_atc,
		Successor,
		CDis,
		marque = OrgCm,
		Predecessor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Deb val},
		N1groupe,
		N2groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale},
		ca_final,
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName = RenameDistributeur@HubName,
		HubSAPid = RenameDistributeur@HubSAPid,
		t_distrubuteur,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameMarque
renameMarque select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		{Code client livré} = POSSAMidString,
		{code client plateforme livree} = HubSAPid,
		{code produit} = reference,
		distributeur,
		{Code postal},
		marque = marque_name,
		qte_ecc = qte_ecoulement,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		document_vente,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		Right_reference = reference,
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		Right_HubSAPid = HubSAPid,
		Type_Facturation,
		qt_ecc_enrichi = qt_final,
		ca_ecc_enrichi,
		quantite = qt_final,
		{origine de la ligne} = data_origin,
		canal_final,
		Commande,
		no_offre,
		{ATC offre} = {ATC 2},
		canal,
		{ATC livré} = {ATC 1},
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		date_id,
		HubName,
		id_canal_final,
		{qte plateforme final},
		{ca plateforme final} = ca_final,
		id_canal,
		marque_code,
		Client,
		Marque,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{ commerciale} = marque_code,
		marque_id,
		Offre,
		{ATC Performance} = ATC,
		source_atc,
		Successor,
		CDis,
		{id marque} = marque,
		Predecessor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Deb val},
		N1groupe,
		N2groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale},
		ca = ca_final,
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		t_distrubuteur,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumn
RenameColumn derive({affecte/non_affecte} = iif(({origine de la ligne}=="facturation decrementé" || {origine de la ligne}=="facturation sans ecoulement" || (distributeur=='vente directe'&&{origine de la ligne}=="facturation")),
  "non affecté",
   "affecté")) ~> affecteNonaffecte
affecteNonaffecte derive({id marque} = iif(instr(marque,'SaunierDuval')>0,1604, 
 iif(instr(marque,'Vaillant')>0,1621,
0))) ~> IdMarque
IdMarque derive({nom du canal} = iif(canal_distribution_final=='45', 'FP', 
 iif(canal_distribution_final=='51', 'FS', 
  iif(canal_distribution_final=='43', 'FC', 'FD')))) ~> NomDuCanal
NomDuCanal select(mapColumn(

		canal,

	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

RenameDistrib filter(N1locale=="FA"||
N1locale=="FB"||
N1locale=="FC"||
N1locale=="FD"||
N1locale=="FE"||
N1locale=="FG"||
N1locale=="FH"||
N1locale=="FL"||
N1locale=="FM"||
N1locale=="FP"||

	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3

		qt_ecc_enrichi = qte_ecoulement,
